person.persName: Michael Lower Stoner (Hickman County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, physician and political figure. Kentucky native. Married to C. F. "Kittie" Stoner. Father of George Washington Stoner, John M. Stoner, C. M. Stoner, Helen B. Stoner, Peter Stoner, Wakefield Stoner, Nancy Stoner, and Irene Stoner. Assisted in writing the Constitution of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in early 19th century. Physician in Cumberland County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Hickman County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Hickman County in 1860.
